episodes.title: Inflatable
Fifi
episodes.overview: Mike aims to settle the score with an enemy; an unexpected opportunity presents itself to Jimmy.

episodes.title: Nailed
episodes.overview: Mike takes a methodical approach to his mission. Someone questions Chuck's capabilities. Jimmy faces a personal dilemma.
Jimmy must make a hard choice. Mike takes control of matters. Hamlin delivers shocking news.
episodes.title: Klick
Mabel
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Chuck's relationship deteriorates. Kim feels the pressure of running her own firm. Mike investigates the note left on his car.
Jimmy and Kim hire an assistant. Mike seeks out a mysterious acquaintance. Chuck uses the law to gain an advantage over Jimmy.
episodes.title: Witness

episodes.overview: Jimmy decides to represent a new client to Kim's dismay. Mike meets a formidable ally who gives a tempting offer.
episodes.title: Sunk Costs

episodes.overview: Jimmy asks a favor of Mike; new complications disrupt Salamancas' business. Chuck and Jimmy struggle with a compromise.
episodes.title: Sabrosito
Chicanery
episodes.overview: Kim and Jimmy face off with an adversary. Jimmy looks to Chuck's past to secure his future. Jimmy loses an ally and gains another.
Jimmy has a new endeavor. Chuck pushes himself to the limit. Nacho finds himself in a power struggle.
episodes.title: Off Brand

episodes.overview: Jimmy tries to settle debts. Nacho reunites with an acquaintance. Mike helps Stacey with a project and makes a connection.
episodes.title: Expenses

episodes.overview: Jimmy is pushed to desperate measures. Nacho picks up a new skill. Mike explores an alliance. Kim stands up to Hamlin.
episodes.title: Slip

episodes.overview: Jimmy visits an old friend and takes up a new pastime. Chuck and Hamlin spar over the future of the firm. Kim faces challenges at work.
episodes.title: Fall

episodes.overview: Kim takes time off. Jimmy tries to make amends. Nacho gambles with his future. Hamlin pushes Chuck to make a decision.
episodes.title: Lantern
Smoke
episodes.overview: Jimmy struggles to cope with Chuck's tragic death. Mike ponders his role at Madrigal. Howard makes a startling confession.

episodes.title: Breathe
episodes.overview: Jimmy seeks new employment. Gus navigates the fallout from Hector's collapse. Kim endeavors to support Jimmy in the wake of Chuck's death.

episodes.title: Something Beautiful
episodes.overview: Jimmy puts a risky plan into motion. As alliances shift, Nacho finds himself in the crosshairs. Kim contemplates her future.
A restless Jimmy embarks on a new endeavor while Mike burns bridges. Kim pursues her bliss. Nacho tries to survive a turf war.
episodes.title: Talk

episodes.overview: Jimmy identifies a new market for his talents. Mike vets a potential partnership. Kim drives a hard bargain.
episodes.title: Quite a Ride

episodes.overview: While Jimmy dreams of Wexler-McGill, Kim makes a bold move. Mike puts a plan into motion for Gus.
episodes.title: Piñata
Something Stupid
episodes.overview: Jimmy expands his business, but runs into a problem that only Kim can solve. Gus intervenes in Hector's medical care. Mike deals with a setback.

episodes.title: Coushatta
episodes.overview: Jimmy goes to great lengths to right a wrong, as Kim pulls out all the stops for a case. Mike lets his team blow off steam. Nacho receives a visitor.

episodes.title: Wiedersehen
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Kim unburden themselves, risking their relationship in the process. Nacho is forced to make the rounds with Lalo. Mike has cause to worry.
Jimmy turns the page on his reputation. Lalo tracks a loose end in Gus' operation. Mike is forced to make a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Winner

episodes.overview: Now doing business as Saul Goodman, Jimmy unveils an unorthodox strategy for client development that tests Kim's tolerance of his new legal persona. Lalo searches for the mysterious Michael, only to discover a problem within his own operation.
episodes.title: Magic Man
50% Off
episodes.overview: Jimmy's promotional stunt has unintended consequences. Nacho takes extreme measures to earn Lalo's trust. Saul is a success at the courthouse but still has yet to win Kim over. Simmering with rage and self-loathing, Mike loses his temper.

Jimmy's business enters uncharted territory. Kim's confidence is tested when she's faced with a legal problem only she can solve. Nacho navigates increased pressure from Gus. Mike continues to spiral.
episodes.title: The Guy for This

episodes.overview: As Jimmy doubles down on Saul Goodman, a deeply conflicted Kim brings him an interesting proposition, Gus makes a sacrifice in order to play the long game, and Mike attempts to smooth things over with his family.
episodes.title: Namaste
Dedicado a Max
episodes.overview: Mike takes an impromptu trip out of town. As she and Jimmy grow closer over their campaign to help a client, Kim makes a surprising call.

episodes.title: Wexler v. Goodman
episodes.overview: Kim tries to pump the brakes on Jimmy's latest scheme, but it may be too late to stop Saul. Mike turns the heat up on Lalo. Nacho attempts to enlist support from above.

episodes.title: JMM
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Kim build a legal firewall with help from Huell. Kim sets things straight with her clients as Jimmy is compromised by his. Gus, at war on all fronts, calms troubled waters in service of his plot to build an empire. Mike does damage control.

episodes.title: Bagman
episodes.overview: When a simple errand for a client goes sideways, Jimmy is pushed to the limit. Mike takes measures to contain the wrath of the cartel. Lalo gets an unexpected visitor.

episodes.title: Bad Choice Road
episodes.overview: In the wake of Jimmy's traumatic misadventure, Kim takes stock of what is important. Jimmy attempts to return to business as usual, but it's more difficult than anticipated. Gus and Mike set a plan in motion.
Jimmy and Kim make a sideways move that takes a serious turn. Nacho gets closer to the cartel than he'd like. Season Finale.
episodes.title: Something Unforgivable

episodes.overview: Nacho runs for his life. Jimmy and Kim hatch a plan. Mike questions his allegiances.
episodes.title: Wine and Roses

episodes.overview: Harsh realities dawn on Nacho. Gus investigates his suspicions.
episodes.title: Carrot and Stick
Rock and Hard Place
episodes.overview: Still on the run, Nacho is forced to choose where his loyalties lie. Jimmy doubles down.
Gus takes extreme measures. Jimmy and Kim enlist a local pro to put on a show.
episodes.title: Hit and Run

episodes.overview: While business booms for Jimmy, the vise tightens on the cat-and-mouse game between Gus and Lalo.
episodes.title: Black and Blue

episodes.overview: Kim and Jimmy enlist a knowledgeable contact. Howard scrutinizes Jimmy’s business practices.
episodes.title: Axe and Grind
Plan and Execution
episodes.overview: Jimmy and Kim deal with a last-minute snag. Howard's investigation finally yields results.
An unexpected visitor forces Jimmy and Kim to face the consequences of their actions.
episodes.title: Point and Shoot

episodes.overview: Gus attempts to smooth things over with the cartel while Mike ties up loose ends.
episodes.title: Fun and Games
Nippy
episodes.overview: A lost dog leads to a new friend. A new player gets in the game.
Emboldened by recent successes, partners throw caution to the wind and escalate their enterprise to new levels.
episodes.title: Breaking Bad

episodes.overview: The stakes are raised when a discovery is made that will send shockwaves far and wide.
episodes.title: Waterworks

episodes.overview: Revelations. Regrets. RICO violations. Jimmy's worlds — and identities — converge in one final showdown.
episodes.title: Saul Gone
